### Getting Data 
The data has been obtained from https://www.berlin.de/ba-lichtenberg/auf-einen-blick/buergerservice/gesundheit/artikel.596005.php The chosen data has been stored in the excel spreedsheet on the GitHub page of the project under https://github.com/Olesiewitch/SPL-Project/blob/master/Dirstrict%20Data/Nr.of%20house%20doctor%20per%2010%2C000%20people%20.xls

## Inserting the data
colnames(Nr.doctor)=c("Districts","Nr.of_house_doctor_per_10,000_people")

Districts= c("Mitte","Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg","Pankow","Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf","Spandau", "Steglitz-Zehlendorf","Tempelhof-Schöneberg","Neukölln","Treptow-Köpenick","Marzahn-Hellersdorf", "Lichtenberg","Reinickendorf") 

Nr.of_house_doctor_per_10,000_people = c(66.7,66.6,65.3,86.7,63.2,67.3,73.5,59.5,53.2,61.8,51.8,64.2)
